mapper.sql: sys_infrastructure_id, sys_road_id, infrastructure_name, infrastructure_type, damage, capital, department, locationDetails
mapper.insert: insert into infrastructure (sys_infrastructure_id, sys_road_id, infrastructure_name, infrastructure_type, damage, capital, department, locationDetails) values (#{sysInfrastructureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysRoadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{infrastructureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infrastructureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{damage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationdetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into infrastructure
sys_infrastructure_id,
sys_road_id,
infrastructure_name,
infrastructure_type,
damage,
capital,
department,
locationDetails,

mapper.update:
update infrastructure
sys_road_id = #{sysRoadId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
infrastructure_name = #{infrastructureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
infrastructure_type = #{infrastructureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
damage = #{damage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
capital = #{capital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
locationDetails = #{locationdetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sys_infrastructure_id = #{sysInfrastructureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update infrastructure set sys_road_id = #{sysRoadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, infrastructure_name = #{infrastructureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, infrastructure_type = #{infrastructureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, damage = #{damage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capital = #{capital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locationDetails = #{locationdetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sys_infrastructure_id = #{sysInfrastructureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM infrastructure i,road r WHERE i.sys_road_id=r.sys_road_id
AND infrastructure_type LIKE concat('%',#{type},'%')
AND road_name LIKE concat('%',#{roadName},'%')
